Program Configuration - Section 3

In the full version of Rayserve you will use this page to configure the program to connect to one of the secure payment gateways listed below. If the gateway you choose is not listed you can use the "Custom Setting", or "None" if you do not require bookings to be supported by a credit card.
  • Authorize
  • DPILink
  • iBill
  • JsWeb
  • LinkPoint
  • Global Commerce
  • Metro Credit
  • Multicards
  • Netbanx
  • Net Benefit
  • PayPal
  • PSIGate
  • RTWare
  • SECpay
  • Secure Hosting
  • Secure Trading
  • Transaction Manager (Rayserve Add-on Module)
  • Signio Payflow Link (Verisign)
  • WorldPay
  • Custom Setting
  • None
Press the "Continue" button to go to the next page.
